name: List Directory Content
description: Scans a folder to list the files and optionally the directories contained immediately within it.
author: @@official.shinkai

include_subfolders.description: If True, also list subfolders (direct children only); default False (files only).

folder_path.description: Full or relative path to the directory (e.g., '/home/user/docs' or 'docs'). Required.

error.description: Error message if validation or listing fails (e.g., path invalid, permissions).

files.description: Sorted list of full absolute paths to files (not directories/subfolders).

subfolders.description: Sorted list of full absolute paths to direct subfolders (empty list if include_subfolders=False).
